author.name: Prof B Buchanan OBE
author.description: FBCS Prof @edinburghnapier Probe edges of science in Cyber/e-Health. Serial innovator/disruptor. Believer fairness, justice & freedom.Crypto Geek. Anti-EU Exit

news.title: Ada Lovelace blazed a trail in science – we need more women to follow in her footsteps
news.summary: Ada Lovelace day falls on the second Tuesday of October every year – it is a time to celebrate the achievements of women in STEM subjects: science, technology, engineering and mathematics.
